hero.title: Welcome to DoqiSHPK
hero.subtitle: High-quality furniture and mattress production
hero.description: Doçi Shpk, in partnership with Starflex, brings together years of experience in high-quality furniture and mattress production. With a modern factory, advanced technology, and a passion for design, we deliver products that combine comfort, durability, and style.

home.aboutDescription2: Our commitment to excellence ensures that every piece of furniture and every mattress meets the highest standards of quality and craftsmanship.
